English: Can you tell me the date of your birthday?
French: Peux-tu me dire la date de ton anniversaire ?

English: I have a meeting on Monday.
Today is Friday. Do you have plans?
French: Aujourd'hui, c'est vendredi. Est-ce que tu as des projets ?

English: The month of April is my favorite.
French: Le mois d'avril est mon mois préféré.
